author: jerenkrantz
msg: Add parameter to APR_SUBDIR_CONFIG to drop options passed to configure
before the subdir's configure is invoked.
Also, add documentation notes on what this macro does and autoconf version
caveats that need to be watched out for!
Inspired by:	Jeff's patch to httpd-2.0 (which was inspired by me on dev@httpd)
